name: DUAL SOULS
description:
THE GAME IS IN PROTOTYPE STAGE ! Thank you for your understanding. :)

This is a Submission for the "Global Game Jam" 2020. Theme : 'Repair'
48hrs.

/ CONTROLS
Move = WASD / ZQSD
Jump = SPACE
Mouse = Look Around
Switch Character = TAB / F
Use = E

Team composed of 2 Artist/Dev,

  • William "Wellgun" Patruno : Blueprint, Level Design
  • Maxime "briZoft" Lancelot : Blueprint, 3D Art, UI, Audio

/ THANKS
To the Global Jam & the 'Institut National Universitaire Champollion' Albi, France for the reception & the buildings !

/ MUSICS 
'Very Low Note' by Kevin MacLeod
'Tranquility' by Kevin MacLeod
incompetech.com
'Disintegrating' by Myuu
soundcloud.com/myuu

/ KNOWN BUGS
PLAY button is not working in main menu (use select levels)
LAST LEVEL lights are very slowly moving
